None.Name: Tainted Plague
None.Description: Activate to release a swarm of Pest Creeper. The little beast can be controlled by the player,move at high speed and are surrounded by poisonous cloud:wherever they go they leave dangerous spores within a 6m radius infect hostile units dealing 15 damage per second. Reusable every 40s.
